docs.name: Vocat API
docs.info: Vocat is a teaching and learning platform that facilitates qualitative and quantitative assessment of a range of media. Built as a collaboration between the Center for Teaching and Learning at Baruch College, City University of New York and Cast Iron Coding of Portland, Oregon, the tool is in active development.
docs.copyright: Copyright 2015 Baruch College, City University of New York

resources.name: Scores
resources.full_description: Scores is a pseudo resource that is used to access aggregate scoring data. This is a read-only resource, then, for all user types.

apis.short_description: returns the current user's scores for a given project
